alert.note: Alert for Burt; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Platte; Stanton; Thurston; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of western Monona, Burt, southern Cuming, Colfax, east central Platte, northwestern Washington, Dodge, eastern Thurston and southeastern Stanton Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 504 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Macy to 3 miles north of West Point to 5 miles south of Leigh. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. The gust front will be near... West Point and Macy around 510 PM CDT. Whiting around 515 PM CDT. Oakland and Decatur around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of the gust front include Schuyler, Onawa, Uehling, Hooper and Blencoe. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 100 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for west central Iowa...and northeastern and east central Nebraska. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Iowa...and northeastern and east central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Burt; Colfax; Cuming; Dodge; Platte; Stanton; Thurston; Washington
